sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-layout class="layout">
    <a-layout-header class="header-one">
      <a-row type="flex" justify="end" align="middle" class="header-one-layout">
        <a-col :span="3">
          <a-select
            v-model="queryParam.status"
            style="width: 100%; margin-right: 8px"
            placeholder="请选择状态"
          >
            <a-select-option value="normal">正常</a-select-option>
            <a-select-option value="Low_battery">低电量(>20%)</a-select-option>
            <a-select-option value="maintenance">待维护</a-select-option>
          </a-select>
        </a-col>
        <a-col :span="1">
          <a-button type="primary" @click="handleSearch" block>查询</a-button>
        </a-col>
      </a-row>
    </a-layout-header>
    <a-layout-content class="content">
      <a-table
        :columns="columns"
        :dataSource="data"
        :pagination="false"
        @change="handleTableChange"
      />
      <a-pagination
        v-model:current="pagination.current"
        :total="pagination.total"
        :pageSize="pagination.pageSize"
        @change="handlePaginationChange"
        showSizeChanger
      />
    </a-layout-content>
  </a-layout>
</template>

<script>
import {
  Layout,
  Select,
  Table,
  Button,
  Row,
  Col,
  Pagination,
} from "ant-design-vue";

export default {
  components: {
    "a-layout": Layout,
    "a-layout-header": Layout.Header,
    "a-layout-content": Layout.Content,
    "a-select": Select,
    "a-table": Table,
    "a-button": Button,
    "a-row": Row,
    "a-col": Col,
    "a-pagination": Pagination,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      queryParam: {
        status: "",
      },
      data: [
        // 表格数据...
      ],
      columns: [
        // 表格列...
      ],
      pagination: {
        current: 1,
        pageSize: 10,
        total: 100, // 假设总数据量为100
      },
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleSearch() {
      console.log("Search with", this.queryParam);
      // 根据 queryParam 来过滤或查询数据
      // 这里应该调用获取数据的方法，并更新 pagination.total
    },
    handleTableChange(pagination, filters, sorter) {
      console.log(pagination, filters, sorter);
      // 根据分页、筛选、排序来更新数据
      // 这里应该调用获取数据的方法，并更新 pagination.total
    },
    handlePaginationChange(page, pageSize) {
      this.pagination.current = page;
      this.pagination.pageSize = pageSize;
      // 调用查询方法，传入新的分页参数
      this.handleSearch();
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.layout {
  height: 100vh;
  background: #f0f2f5;
}

.header-one {
  background: #001529;
  padding: 0 16px;
  height: 50px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.header-one-layout {
  width: 100%;
}

.content {
  padding: 16px;
}
</style>
